name: Indigo Maheshwari Silk Bagru Print Saree ( MS220507)
description:
Package Contain:

Saree
length; 5.5 m;
Width: 1.16 m

Blouse piece
length: 0.8 m

Meterial
Pure Maheshwari Silk

Discription

Bagru process of printing involves hand block printing using natural and other dyes through traditional process practiced in the town of Bagru in Rajasthan.
Handblock printing is a centuries old art form that utilizes a hand carved wood block, dipped in dye and stamped by hand onto fabric.
Hand wash cold separately

name: Exclusive Hand Block Print Chanderi Silk Suit Set ( BTSJ 179 )
description:
Description

Package Details : Chanderi Silk Suit, Cotton Botton & Chanderi Silk Dupatta (Unstitched)

Suit Fabric : Chanderi Silk
Suit Length : 2.5 Mtr
Botton Fabric : Pure Cotton
Bottom Length : 2.5 Mtr
Dupatta Fabric : Chanderi Silk
Dupatta Length : 2.5 Mtr

From the renowned Chain of ethnic wear In Rajasthan, Bagru Art presents you

Chanderi silk suit Set

Hand Block Print is a famous ancient printing technique that utilizes a hand-carved teak wooden block which dipped in dye and stamped by hand onto fabric. It is also known by name “block printing” or “woodblock printing.”

Everyone can't stop looking at you when you wear this beautiful block print Chanderi Silk. Suit Set. This unstitched suit comes along with cotton bottom and Chanderi Silk Dupatta.

name: Maheshwari Silk Bagru Print Saree  ( AMS0905 )
description:
An Ajrakh printed Maheshwari silk saree is indeed a beautiful and elegant choice. Maheshwari silk sarees are known for their lightweight yet luxurious feel, making them a comfortable and stylish option for various occasions. When Graced with Ajrakh prints, these sarees become even more special.

Ajrakh printing is a traditional technique that involves intricate block printing with natural dyes. This symmetry adds a timeless charm to the saree, making it a classic choice that never goes out of style.

Package Contain:

Saree
length; 5.5 m;
Width: 1.16 m

Blouse piece
length: 0.8 m

Meterial
Ajrakh Maheshwari Silk

The combination of Maheshwari silk and Ajrakh prints creates a saree that is not only visually appealing but also carries a cultural and historical significance. It reflects the wealth of India's textile heritage and provides a delightful means to display your individuality and fashion taste.

Handblock printing is a centuries old art form that utilizes a hand carved wood block, dipped in dye and stamped by hand onto fabric.
Hand wash cold separately

Description

From the renowned Chain of ethnic wear In Rajasthan, Bagru Art presents you

Kota Doria Block Print Suit Set for Women With Kota Doria Dupatta

Handblock Print is a famous ancient printing technique that utilizes a hand-carved teak wooden block which dipped in dye and stamped by hand onto fabric. It is also known by name “block printing” or “woodblock printing.”

Everyone can't stop looking at you when you wear this beautiful block print Kota Doria suit. This unstitched suit comes along with cotton bottom and Kota Doria Dupatta.
